summary: This slick ENB setup will bring the land of Skyrim into better focus with a subtle but very effective sharpening effect using the FXAA Post Processing Injector. A crisp and clean ENB that has all the features of the new enbseries 0.119 such as Sky Lighting, SSIL, SSAO and DoF.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://img145.imageshack.us/img145/2475/enbsharp1copy.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][size=+1.5]This slick ENB setup will bring the land of Skyrim into better focus with an ever so subtle but very effective sharpening effect using the FXAA Post Processing Injector. A crisp and clean ENB that has all the features of the new enbseries 0.119 such as Sky Lighting, SSIL, SSAO and DoF. ENB Sharp aims to keep a vanilla feel to the game so it does not use a special pallette and will look great with your favorite enbpallette.bmp. And if you don\'t like the sharpening effect simply press the pause key to toggle it on or off and enjoy a well balanced ENB config.[/size][/center]

[center][size=+2][color=yellow] If you enjoy this work please help to ENDORSE!![/color][/size][/center]

[center][color=red][b]SCROLL DOWN FOR INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS[/b][/color][/center]

[center][size=+1.5][color=cyan]See every detail of the characters in Skyrim with ENB Sharp\'s unique sharpening filter[/size][/color][/center]
[center][img]http://img834.imageshack.us/img834/2764/tesv2012090222294262.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://img94.imageshack.us/img94/3324/tesv2012090222300931.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://img515.imageshack.us/img515/369/tesv2012090222465018.jpg[/img][/center][center][img]http://img694.imageshack.us/img694/732/tesv2012090222080353.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://img411.imageshack.us/img411/5967/tesv2012090222035036.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][size=+1.5][color=cyan]See the cities of Skyrim as never before in high detail[/color][/size][/center]
[center][img]http://img600.imageshack.us/img600/1198/tesv2012090222334731.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/1381/tesv2012090222002350.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://img339.imageshack.us/img339/3739/tesv2012090222005053.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://img688.imageshack.us/img688/9936/tesv2012090223031013.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][size=+1.5][color=cyan]ENB Sharp will provide almost storybook illustrated-like scenes[/color][/size][/center]
[center][img]http://img822.imageshack.us/img822/9895/tesv2012090220150402.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://img843.imageshack.us/img843/5567/tesv2012090121155866.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://img842.imageshack.us/img842/6070/tesv2012090221565406.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/9845/tesv2012090221594096.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][size=+1.5][color=cyan]Optional performance mode that looks and plays great even without SSAO and DoF[/color][/size][/center]
[center][img]http://img209.imageshack.us/img209/3830/tesv2012090222545413.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://img201.imageshack.us/img201/2659/tesv2012090119222068.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://img69.imageshack.us/img69/2973/tesv2012090220214710.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://img195.imageshack.us/img195/372/tesv2012090222443075.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][heading][size=+2][color=red][u]INSTALLATION:[/u][/color][/size][/heading][/center]
[list=1]
[*]Uninstall or backup any previous versions of ENB or any mod that alters the imagespace such as Climates of Tamriel, Reaslistic Lighting, RCRN etc..
[*]Download and install ENBSeries v0.119 for TES Skyrim from [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0119.htm]HERE[/url] -note: to download the zip you must click on the arrow pointing down on the download page :)
[*]Open up your SkyrimPrefs.ini and set \'bFloatPointRenderTarget=1\' if not already done
[*]To work correctly, sky lighting requires rendering objects to shadow, so edit manually the following lines in file SkyrimPrefs.ini:
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1
[*]Do NOT download with the download manager, Manually download ENBSharpv1.rar and copy contents of the ENBSharp folder into your main Skyrim NOT the data folder
[*][color=yellow]OPTIONAL:[/color]Copy contents of the optional files folder if you choose to use the Performance option or if you want to remove the Letterbox(black bars) effect. *note performance option will disable SSAO, SSIL and DoF
[*][color=red]SUGGESTED:[/color]Install recommended mods in the section below
[*]ENJOY!!
[/list]
[color=yellow][b]ENB Sharp does not use an enbpallette.bmp file so feel free to drop in any enbpallette.bmp to your main Skyrim folder from your favorite ENB config to use it along side ENB Sharp[/b][/color]

[center][heading][size=+2][color=yellow][u]Recommended mods:[/u][/color][/size][/heading][/center]
[list]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12808]Creepy Dungeons[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12454]Dark Dungeons for ENB[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=736]Interior and Dungeon Fog Remover[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9930]Revamped Exterior Fog[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2616]Sun and Cloud textures[/url]
[/list]
[center][img]http://img341.imageshack.us/img341/6208/tesv2012090221591326.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][heading][size=+2][color=cyan][u]Credits and Thanks[/u][/color][/size][/heading][/center]
[color=yellow][b]Boris Vorontsov[/b][/color] -Creator of ENBSeries
[color=yellow][b]HeliosDoubleSix[/b][/color] -Creator of the HD6 shader code
[color=yellow][b]MATSO[/b][/color] -Creator of the Depth of Field code
[color=yellow][b]some_dude[/b][/color] -Creator of the FXAA PPI

[b]Thank you! If you like please [color=yellow]ENDORSE![/color] and feel free to show your support by adding your own user image :)[/b]
[center][img]http://img841.imageshack.us/img841/7857/tesv2012090222114983.jpg[/img][/center]
author: joey4track
